==== esDecorators-emitDecoratorMetadata.ts (0 errors) ====
    declare let dec: any;
    
    @dec
    class C {
        constructor(x: number) {}
    
        @dec
        method(x: number) {}
    
        @dec
        set x(x: number) {}
    
        @dec
        y: number;
    
        @dec
        static method(x: number) {}
    
        @dec
        static set x(x: number) {}
    
        @dec
        static y: number;
    }
    
    (@dec class C {
        constructor(x: number) {}
    
        @dec
        method(x: number) {}
    
        @dec
        set x(x: number) {}
    
        @dec
        y: number;
    
        @dec
        static method(x: number) {}
    
        @dec
        static set x(x: number) {}
    
        @dec
        static y: number;
    });
